house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1971 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Library, Microwave, StorageSpace
